author: mpn9737
content:
Had some time to take a look at vitalik's post.
It doesn't cover the impact if verkle tries based on ec-crypto are included in the picture.
I think it would be interesting and worthwhile to have that perspective written down there (or alternatively somewhere else) as well.

author: mpn9737
content:
Maybe, one of the core questions I have on my mind:
Do EC-based Verkle tries significantly change the impact of Quantum-based attacks on Ethereum and/or the proposed migration procedure?
